title: MPs to investigate police watchdog over 'whitewash' in botched VIP sex abuse inquiry
text:
MPs have launched an investigation into a police watchdog accused of a “whitewash” after it cleared five officers in the disastrous £2 milion probe into a VIP Westminster paedophile ring.

The Home Affairs Committee announced yesterday (Mon) that it will investigate the Independent Office for Police Conduct (IOPC), which handles serious complaints about officers and staff in England and Wales.

The IOPC faced a backlash when it ruled none of the Metropolitan Police officers who oversaw the botched Operation Midland investigation into a non-existent “VIP paedophile ring” should face misconduct proceedings.

It said it had found no evidence of criminality or wrongdoing in the investigation of claims...
description: MPs have launched an investigation into a police watchdog accused of a “whitewash” after it cleared five officers in the disastrous £2 milion probe into a VIP Westminster paedophile ring.
